name: Gabriel does a thing
desc: This, just...this. By yours truly, responsive design, static blog, light / dark theme and animations

name: Sightsee
desc: SERN stack vacation site complete with followable holiday destinations and user authentication with JSON web tokens

name: Urban Viking
desc: E-commerce site with context and stripe API

name: Vex Blogs
desc: A next.js 'dev.to'-style blogging app, with efficient real-time data hydration using Incremental Static Regeneration

name: Firestarter
desc: An angular kanban board + a small angular universal ssr demo, dynamic forms enbale both google and email login

name: Firemart
desc: MEAN stack app, dockerized express backend, frontend hosted w/ firebase. Features auth with JWT, admin CRUD w/ image upload, a real-time cart and printable invoices

name: Bug Tracker
desc: A bug tracking app, GraphQL backend API, Postgres database managed with prisma. deploy coming soon.
